8628258,s5,T10,T11,The N terminus of the predicted 96-kDa ,SIP4, protein is homologous to the DNA-binding domain of the ,GAL4," family of transcriptional activators, with a C6 zinc cluster adjacent to a coiled-coil motif The C terminus contains a leucine zipper motif and an acidic region.",Not_a_complex
